comment._content: Only those two men put this in perspective.    Huge trees....

comment.author: 47299416@N03
comment._content: Nice snap ! I thought Sequoias were the only ones. Spruce - do they belong to the same family ?

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: Good question june_o_blossom! I searched the OSU College of Forestry's "Index of Common Names" site, which told me that the Spruce is in the Picea genus and the Giant Sequoia is in the Sequoiadendron genus. If you want to know more about trees in the NW, I heartily encourage you to check out the Common Trees of the Pacific Northwest page -- it's full of great information!
